name: places/ChIJxzgnNAVZwokR9zWbuatnGeA
adrFormatAddress: 630 1st Ave. #14b, New York, NY 10016-3712, USA

originalText.text: Lee Drexler is the real thing. She knows her antiques cold, including jewelry—she has a special separate certification for gem stones. Try to get her talking a bit about all the super-famous and wealthy clients she has worked with...but don’t expect personal details from this most discreet of appraisers! And be assured that any number of valuable properties she has appraised end up at prestigious auction houses. My personal appraising experiences with Lee include her challenge of evaluating my husband’s amazing collection of over six hundred trumpets and cornets. Lastly, she is super-organized so you are guaranteed a speedy turnaround and impeccable documentation in a most professional final document. I would use her services again— in fact, I have.

originalText.text: Without a doubt Lee Dexler is the most professional and knowledgeable Art Appraiser in the business. I have used her for years which included objects that are very unique and rare items which presented no problem for her. Highly recommend her services and great personality too.

originalText.text: Lee is the best in the business. She has over 40 years of experience. I have used her services many times in the past and was extremely pleased. Lee is a pleasure to speak and learn from. I would highly recommend her.

originalText.text: I have worked with Lee Drexler and she is the consummate professional. Her experience and knowledge are extraordinary and she has my highest recommendation.
